com.feathersui.maven.plugin.lime_openfl

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feathersui.maven.plugin.lime_openfl.App

  • public class App
extends Object
    Represents the <app> element of the Lime project.xml format.

    The following example sets the main and file fields. 

     
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <main>com.example.MyApp</main>
     <file>myapp</file>
   </app>
 </limeProject>
    See Also:
    Lime project.xml format: <app>

    • Field Summary

      Optionally sets the minimum SWF version for `flash` and `air` targets.
      String preloader
      Optionally sets a class to use as a custom preloader.
      Float swfVersion

    • Field Detail

      • main

        public String main
        The main entry point of the application. Represents the <app main=""> attribute of the Lime project.xml format.

        Hint: If the <main> element is not defined, the default value will be `Main`.

        The following example sets the <main> element. 

         
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <main>com.example.MyApp</main>
   </app>
 </limeProject>

      • file

        public String file
        The name of the output file. Represents the <app file=""> attribute of the Lime project.xml format.

        The following example sets the <file> element. 

         
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <file>myapp</file>
   </app>
 </limeProject>

      • preloader

        public String preloader
        Optionally sets a class to use as a custom preloader. Represents the <app preloader=""> attribute of the Lime project.xml format.

        The following example sets the <preloader> element. 

         
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <preloader>com.example.MyPreloader</preloader>
   </app>
 </limeProject>

      • swfVersion

        public Float swfVersion
        Optionally sets the SWF version for `flash` and `air` targets. Represents the <app swf-version=""> attribute of the Lime project.xml format.

        The following example sets the <swf-version> element. 

         
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <swf-version>11</swf-version>
   </app>
 </limeProject>

      • minSwfVersion

        public Float minSwfVersion
        Optionally sets the minimum SWF version for `flash` and `air` targets. Represents the <app min-swf-version=""> attribute of the Lime project.xml format.

        The following example sets the <min-swf-version> element. 

         
 <limeProject>
   <app>
     <min-swf-version>11</min-swf-version>
   </app>
 </limeProject>

      • App

        public App()
